nodes.bodyText:
Proposing to add commons-beanutils to the list as part of this fix.  See PR-5124 and the recommendation from @basil

  
    
  
    

  
  This file contains bidirectional Unicode text that may be interpreted or compiled differently than what appears below. To review, open the file in an editor that reveals hidden Unicode characters. Learn more about bidirectional Unicode characters


  


    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                  - dependency-name: "org.codehaus.groovy:groovy-all"
          
          
            
                  - dependency-name: "org.codehaus.groovy:groovy-all"
          
          
            
                  - dependency-name: "commons-beanutils:commons-beanutils"
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -9,4 +9,4 @@ updates:
     schedule:
       interval: "daily"
     ignore:
-      dependency-name: "org.codehaus.groovy:groovy-all"
+      - dependency-name: "org.codehaus.groovy:groovy-all"

nodes.bodyText: BTW we should be including comments referring to written reasons for avoiding certain updates. For Groovy it is pretty well-known but for BeanUtils the issues in #4928 and #4328 were pretty technical.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -9,4 +9,5 @@ updates:
     schedule:
       interval: "daily"
     ignore:
-      dependency-name: "org.codehaus.groovy:groovy-all"
+      - dependency-name: "org.codehaus.groovy:groovy-all"
+      - dependency-name: "commons-beanutils:commons-beanutils"

nodes.bodyText:
just wanted to fix dependabot in this PR,
comments added in #5130 feel free to debate / suggest phrasing
